alert.note: Alert for Clark; Scotland (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 02 at 10:28AM CST until December 03 at 3:00AM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 AM CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...West to northwest winds 25 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of east central, northeast and southeast Iowa and northeast Missouri. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 3 AM CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...The strong winds will lead to difficult travel conditions, especially for high profile vehicles. Unsecured objects including holiday decorations may be blown around. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
